sentences.en: "Actually, most of my tennis is at club level," he admitted.
sentences.cn: “说实话，我的网球基本上属于业余水平，”他承认说。

sentences.en: A barrage would halt the flow upstream and lift the water level.
sentences.cn: 一道拦河坝将会在上游拦住水流，抬升水位。

sentences.en: a level surface suitable for wheelchairs
sentences.cn: 适合轮椅的平坦表面

sentences.en: Bias against women permeates every level of the judicial system.
sentences.cn: 各级司法机构普遍存在对女性的偏见。

sentences.en: Cover with a layer of sand and level it off.
sentences.cn: 铺上一层沙，并把它推平。

sentences.en: Each home boasts an unprecedented level of quality throughout.
sentences.cn: 每家的质量都堪称一流。

sentences.en: Eddie said my story was on the level.
sentences.cn: 艾迪说我的故事很真实。

sentences.en: Faculty members complain that their students are unprepared to do college-level work.
sentences.cn: 学院的老师们抱怨说他们的学生还很不适应大学的课业。

sentences.en: He has also had managerial experience on every level.
sentences.cn: 他还有各个层级的管理经验。

sentences.en: I did my level best in math class.
sentences.cn: 数学课上我尽量做得最好

sentences.en: Inflation fell to its lowest level in 30 years.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀降至30年来最低点。

sentences.en: Kevin was always level-headed with both feet on the ground.
sentences.cn: 凯文总是头脑冷静，脚踏实地。

sentences.en: Once the rate rises it never drops back to its previous level.
sentences.cn: 一旦价格上去了就再也不会降到以前的水平了。

sentences.en: Prices leveled off.
sentences.cn: 价格趋于稳定

sentences.en: The floor was level, but the ceiling sloped toward his head.
sentences.cn: 地板是平的，但天花板朝他的头这边倾斜。

sentences.en: The floors in the old house were not completely level.
sentences.cn: 老房子的地面不是完全平整的。

sentences.en: The melting ice caused a rise in sea level.
sentences.cn: 冰川消融造成海平面上升。

sentences.en: The pilot throttles back slightly to maintain level flight.
sentences.cn: 飞行员稍稍减速，以保持水平飞行。

sentences.en: The results show the level of frustration among hospital doctors.
sentences.cn: 这些结果显示了医院医生的不满程度。

sentences.en: the two were level pegging after three heats.
sentences.cn: 三局过后，二者僵持不下。

sentences.en: The water level in Lake Taihu has reached record levels.
sentences.cn: 太湖水位达到了历史最高值。

sentences.en: This problem needs to be dealt with at an organizational level.
sentences.cn: 这个问题需要在机构层面上解决。

sentences.en: Training is offered at each level in the department.
sentences.cn: 部门内各级人员都能获得培训。

sentences.en: Use this technique to control your level of arousal.
sentences.cn: 用这种方法来控制性兴奋程度。

sentences.en: Your arms should be at the same level as your desk.
sentences.cn: 手臂应该与桌子齐平。

words.tran_cn: 平等主义者；水平测量员

phrases.tran_cn: 努力尝试自己所能做的最好的
n. （英国）一般学历证书考试优等（等于A level）
(英)（比赛中）僵持不下，水平相当
（连通器内）液面等高，液面相平
进入平飞：飞机在爬升或俯冲后进入与地面平行的平飞状态
n. 水位；水平面；水准仪

trans.tran_cn: 齐平的，平的，地位相等的，得分相等的，平稳的，
trans.tran_en: flat and not sloping in any direction

trans.tran_cn: 水平，程度，层次，看事物的角度，水位，高度，楼层，水准仪
trans.tran_en: the amount or degree of something, compared to another amount or degree

trans.tran_cn: 扳平，使平坦，夷平，使相等，使瞄准
trans.tran_en: to make the score in a game or competition equal
to make something flat and smooth
